casebody.data:
No. 09-527. Jeffrey A. Beard, Secretary, Pennsylvania Department of Corrections, et al., Petitioners v. Brian Thomas. 559 U.S. 1025, 130 S. Ct. 1942,

176 L. Ed. 2d 399,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 2463. March 22, 2010.

Motion of respondents for leave to proceed in forma pauperis granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit denied.

Same case below, 570 F.3d 105.
